<<<<<<< HEAD
The saints submission to the will of God. Or, A sermon preached at the funerall of a vertuous young gentleman, Mr. William Elmes the only son and heir of Thomas Elmes, of Warmington in the county of Northampton, Esquire. By Richard Resbury, minister of Oundle. Resbury, Richard, 1607-1674.
[16] p.
printed by T.C. for J. Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old-baily, London : 1654.
Some running titles read: The saints subjection to the will of God. Signatures: A-B⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The saints submission to the will of God. Or, A sermon preached at the funerall of a vertuous young gentleman, Mr. William Elmes the only son and heir of Thomas Elmes, of Warmington in the county of Northampton, Esquire. By Richard Resbury, minister of Oundle. Resbury, Richard, 1607-1674.
[16] p.
printed by T.C. for J. Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old-baily, London : 1654.
Some running titles read: The saints subjection to the will of God. Signatures: A-B⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
J. Wright
T.C.
the Kings Head in the Old-baily
